NOTES: using E92Q/E93Q/E29Q/D34N mutant ferredoxin, the reaction mixture contains regulator of fumarate and nitrate reduction (100 nM), sulfite reductase (ferredoxin) (800 nM), and sulfite (0.5 mM) in 30 mM potassium phosphate buffer, pH 7.0 and 25 mM NaCl

using E92Q/E30Q/D34N mutant ferredoxin, the reaction mixture contains regulator of fumarate and nitrate reduction (100 nM), sulfite reductase (ferredoxin) (800 nM), and sulfite (0.5 mM) in 30 mM potassium phosphate buffer, pH 7.0 and 25 mM NaCl

using E92Q/E93Q mutant ferredoxin, the reaction mixture contains regulator of fumarate and nitrate reduction (100 nM), sulfite reductase (ferredoxin) (800 nM), and sulfite (0.5 mM) in 30-mM potassium phosphate buffer, pH 7.0 and 25 mM NaCl

using wild type ferredoxin, the reaction mixture contains ferredoxin-NADP+ reductase (100 nM), sulfite reductase (ferredoxin) (800 nM), and sulfite (0.5 mM) in 30 mM potassium phosphate buffer, pH 7.0 and 25 mM NaCl
